name: [UN]Finishe...
description:
Stagnated by the inability to Finish, horrors manifest and unleash.

As someone who has never been able to finish projects, your goal is simple, fight against the time, the insecurities, the emotional roller coaster and the terrible feelings that cast a shadow from your past in an attempt  to deliver a single project and break free from a never ending vicious cycle.

NOTE: A broken Jam entry will (probably but not surely) be updated soon through external links...

NOTE 2: The game stays true to the content, purpose and name, it is not finished and like others, may never will be...
